verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] set to host a joint press conference with President Muhammadu Buhari of Nigeria on Monday afternoon .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] is [V: set] [ARG2: to host a joint press conference with President Muhammadu Buhari of Nigeria on Monday afternoon] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is set to [V: host] [ARG1: a joint press conference with President Muhammadu Buhari of Nigeria] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday afternoon] .
